    G

    Game - Class in project.game
    Represents the game grid and manages game logic, including node creation, initialization, and win condition checking.
    GameBoardPreviewView - Class in project.gui
    The GameBoardPreviewView class represents a graphical preview of the game board.
    GameBoardPreviewView(Game) - Constructor for class project.gui.GameBoardPreviewView
    Creates a new GameBoardPreviewView for the given game.
    GameBoardView - Class in project.gui
    The GameBoardView class represents the graphical view of the game board.
    GameBoardView(Game, Button, Button) - Constructor for class project.gui.GameBoardView
    Creates a new GameBoardView for the given game with undo and redo buttons.
    GameLoader - Class in project.game
    The GameLoader class is responsible for loading game configuration from a file and setting up a game board accordingly.
    GameLoader(String) - Constructor for class project.game.GameLoader
    Constructs a GameLoader to load the game configuration from the specified file.
    GameNode - Class in project.common
    The GameNode class represents a node in the game grid, which could be a part of a wire, a bulb, or a power source.
    GameNode(int, int, NodeType) - Constructor for class project.common.GameNode
    Constructor for creating a GameNode with a specific position and type (no sides).
    GameNode(int, int, NodeType, Side...) - Constructor for class project.common.GameNode
    Constructor for creating a GameNode with a specific position, type, and sides.
    GameNodePreviewView - Class in project.gui
    The GameNodePreviewView class represents a visual preview of a GameNode.
    GameNodePreviewView(GameNode) - Constructor for class project.gui.GameNodePreviewView
    Creates a new preview view for the given GameNode.
    GameNodeView - Class in project.gui
    The GameNodeView class represents the visual representation of a GameNode in the game.
    GameNodeView(GameNode) - Constructor for class project.gui.GameNodeView
    Constructs a GameNodeView for the given GameNode.

    The GamePreviewWindowView class represents a window that displays a preview of the game board.

    R

    RandomizeGame - Class in project.game
    The RandomizeGame class handles the randomization of game elements in the game, including the initial randomization phase and the phase where the game continues until no bulbs are turned on.
    RandomizeGame(Game, GameLoader) - Constructor for class project.game.RandomizeGame
    Initializes the game randomization process.
    redo() - Method in class project.game.CommandManager
    Redoes the last undone command, if any.

    U

    undo() - Method in interface project.game.Command
    Undoes the command.
    undo() - Method in class project.game.CommandManager
    Undoes the last executed command, if any.
    undo() - Method in class project.game.TurnCommand
    Undoes the command by rotating the game node counterclockwise (opposite direction of the clock).
    update(Observable) - Method in interface project.common.Observer
     
    update(Observable) - Method in class project.game.Game
    This method is called when an Observable object (in this case, a GameNode) notifies its observers.
